title: What year was the widening of US 421 from US 74/76 to SR 210 completed?
text:
I haven't been able to find a definite answer for you. I did find an
old story about some road improvements north of this stretch back in
1982, so the widening you refer to had to have been before that. If
you have any clues that could help pinpoint a date, let me know.
Sorry.
